seed.description: Global seed to use in the simulations

stage_age_evolutions.description: Stage-age average evolution times (in days), taken from the maximums in Heuch et al. (2000)

delta_p.description: Weibull power transformation constant for each development stage. L0's value is taken from Stien et al. (2005) as beta_2, while the others are taken from Aldrin et al. (2017)

delta_s.description: Weibull shape transformation constant for each development stage

delta_m10.description: 10 °C median development time. L0's value is taken from Stien et al. (2005) as beta_1, while the others are taken from Aldrin et al. (2017)

env_meanEMB.description: Mean Emamectin Benzoate in the environment

env_sigEMB.description: Standard deviation of Emamectin Benzoate in the environment

EMBmort.description: Probability of mortality due to Emamectin Benzoate

delay_EMB.description: Delay between application and observation of noticeable effects of the Emamectin Benzoate (in days)

delta_EMB.description: Ratio between durability and current sea temperature (unit: days / °C)

background_lice_mortality_rates.description: Background lice mortality rates per stage (from Aldrin et al., 2017)

reproduction_eggs_first_extruded.description: Initial number of viable eggs after the first extrusion (from Aldrin et al., 2017)

reproduction_age_dependence.description: Exponential coefficient on viable eggs depending on age

dam_unavailability.description: Female unavailability time after mating (in days)

farm_data.description: Average temperatures at known farm locations. Farm temperatures will be interpolated from them. Data taken from www.seatemperature.org
